News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Gateshead
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Gateshead
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Gateshead
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers National League home fixture against Gateshead on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers will be hoping to close the gap on league leaders Forest Green and will look to improve on their 0-0 draw against FC Halifax Town.

Gateshead currently sit 11th in the National League and are on a six match unbeaten run in the league.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 0-0 Halifax (Emirates FA Cup)
Forest Green 1-1 Daggers
Daggers 1-0 Aldershot
Daggers 1-1 Macclesfield
Daggers 3-1 Wealdstone (Emirates FA Cup)

Gateshead
Gateshead 2-2 Wrexham
Guiseley 1-1 Gateshead
Maidstone 0-2 Gateshead
Gateshead 2-2 Alfreton (Emirates FA Cup)
Alfreton 2-2 Gateshead (Emirates FA Cup)

Team News
Okenabirhie, Robson, Howell could still miss out following their injuries. Guttridge and Benson will be looking at regaining full fitness following their appearences in the draw against Halifax.

Previous Meetings
The Daggers and the Heed have met eight times with Gateshead having the better of it. The Daggers have only one once in previous meetings.

Fixtures
There is a full list of Vanarama National League fixtures on Saturday with a 3pm kick off (unless stated)

Bromley V Boreham Wood
Dagenham and Redbridge V Gateshead
Eastleigh V York
Guiseley V Torquay
Lincoln V Aldershot
Macclesfield V Forest Green
Solihull V Dover
Southport V Maidstone
Sutton V Barrow
Tranmere V Chester
Wrexham V Braintree

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
